alert.note: Alert for Christian; Dallas; Douglas; Greene; Laclede; Ozark; Polk; Stone; Taney; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:55AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ozark, Webster, southern Dallas, Wright, western Douglas, Taney, Christian, southern Laclede, southeastern Stone, southeastern Polk and eastern Greene Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 654 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Buffalo to Marshfield to 6 miles northeast of Sparta to near Branson. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Springfield... Nixa... Ozark... Lebanon... Branson... Lake Taneycomo... Table Rock Lake... Table Rock State Park... Bennett Spring State Park... Bull Shoals Lake... Marshfield... Hollister... Buffalo... Rogersville... Silver Dollar City... Ava... Kimberling City... Strafford... Forsyth... Seymour... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 80 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Dallas; Douglas; Greene; Laclede; Ozark; Polk; Stone; Taney; Webster; Wright
